author: timbeiko
content: <@!304360319948685312> surely there will be, but the reason I'm not too concerned about it is that it is extremely easy to figure out. You just need to calculate the `gasUsed` * `baseFeePerGas` in each block to get it, and given that information is in the block header, it will be very accessible.
